00027 #ifndef KADEMLIA_NET_PACKETTRACKING_H
00028 #define KADEMLIA_NET_PACKETTRACKING_H
00029 
00030 #include <map>
00031 #include <list>
00032 #include "../utils/UInt128.h"
00033 #include "../../Types.h"
00034 
00035 namespace Kademlia
00036 {
00037 
00038 struct TrackPackets_Struct {
00039     uint32_t ip;
00040     uint32_t inserted;
00041     uint8_t  opcode;
00042 };
00043 
00044 struct TrackChallenge_Struct {
00045     uint32_t    ip;
00046     uint32_t    inserted;
00047     uint8_t     opcode;
00048     CUInt128    contactID;
00049     CUInt128    challenge;
00050 };
00051 
00052 struct TrackPacketsIn_Struct {
00053     struct TrackedRequestIn_Struct {
00054         uint32_t m_count;
00055         uint32_t m_firstAdded;
00056         uint8_t  m_opcode;
00057         bool     m_dbgLogged;
00058     };
00059 
00060     TrackPacketsIn_Struct()
00061     {
00062         m_lastExpire = 0;
00063         m_ip = 0;
00064     }
00065 
00066     uint32_t m_ip;
00067     uint32_t m_lastExpire;
00068     typedef std::list<TrackedRequestIn_Struct>  TrackedRequestList;
00069     TrackedRequestList  m_trackedRequests;
00070 };
00071 
00072 class CPacketTracking
00073 {
00074       public:
00075     CPacketTracking() throw() { lastTrackInCleanup = 0; }
00076     virtual ~CPacketTracking();
00077 
00078       protected:
00079     void AddTrackedOutPacket(uint32_t ip, uint8_t opcode);
00080     bool IsOnOutTrackList(uint32_t ip, uint8_t opcode, bool dontRemove = false);
00081     bool InTrackListIsAllowedPacket(uint32_t ip, uint8_t opcode, bool validReceiverkey);
00082     void InTrackListCleanup();
00083     void AddLegacyChallenge(const CUInt128& contactID, const CUInt128& challengeID, uint32_t ip, uint8_t opcode);
00084     bool IsLegacyChallenge(const CUInt128& challengeID, uint32_t ip, uint8_t opcode, CUInt128& contactID);
00085     bool HasActiveLegacyChallenge(uint32_t ip) const;
00086 
00087       private:
00088     static bool IsTrackedOutListRequestPacket(uint8_t opcode) throw();
00089     typedef std::list<TrackPackets_Struct>      TrackedPacketList;
00090     typedef std::list<TrackChallenge_Struct>    TrackChallengeList;
00091     typedef std::map<uint32_t, TrackPacketsIn_Struct*>  TrackedPacketInMap;
00092     TrackedPacketList   listTrackedRequests;
00093     TrackChallengeList  listChallengeRequests;
00094     TrackedPacketInMap  m_mapTrackPacketsIn;
00095     uint32_t        lastTrackInCleanup;
00096 };
00097 
00098 } // namespace Kademlia
